Meet Crista - British Diva

My girlfriend Crista is working a show at Knott’s Berry Farm right now. They pulled her during a break yesterday to do some voiceovers for Knott’s Scary Farm. I’m excited, I’m so there to listen to her work of random screams, an evil valley girl princess, and my favorite: the drunken british diva. Accents, fake or not, are hot.

—Aug 11, 2005
